nodes.text: Bellana was a female Cathar who was a captain in the Freebooter's Trade Union during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She often represented the Trade Union on both Carrick Station and Vaiken Spacedock.

Captain Bellana was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 3.0. She serves as the Reputation Vendor for the Freebooter's Trade Union, the Reputation group added for the Shadow Packs that premiered in Update 3.0.
